Articles.Content: Looks like a normal RP week to me.

> 
> Looks like a normal RP week to me.

Funny, since its set in the 2600s.

> 
> Looks like a normal RP *hour* to me.

I fixed it for ya.

Nice picture!
Wasn\'t this the name of some isometric RPG a few years back?

> 
> Wasn\'t this the name of some isometric RPG a few years back?

No idea. Apparently Avalon was an island that King Arthur went to. I thought it would sound good for a colony planet.

Edit: The RPG was called \'Battle For Avalon\'
